IntVectorProperty.name: BranchDecompositionPlanarLayout
IntVectorProperty.label: Branch Decomposition Planar Layout
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Display a planar layout of the branch decomposition (each node is a branch in the original tree).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BranchSpacing
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Branch Spacing
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Manage the distance between branch in the branch decomposition planar layout.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ImportantPairs
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Important Pairs (%)
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Threshold to consider a persistence pair as important. They will be displayed such that they are much more visible than the other pairs.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaximumImportantPairs
IntVectorProperty.label: Maximum Number of Important Pairs
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximum number of important pairs for each tree.

IntVectorProperty.name: MinimumImportantPairs
IntVectorProperty.label: Minimum Number of Important Pairs
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Minimum number of important pairs for each tree.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ImportantPairsSpacing
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Important Pairs Spacing
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Manage the distance of the important pairs with each other.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: NonImportantPairsSpacing
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Non Important Pairs Spacing
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Manage the distance of the non-important pairs with each other.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: NonImportantPairsProximity
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Non Important Pairs Proximity
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Manage the distance of the non-important pairs to the important pairs they are attached to.
